author: James Joyce
text: Dear Sir I duly received your registered letter of 25 inst with returned medical certificate and am very grateful to your committee for the grant of £75 voted me at its last meeting. Today the Société de Credit Suisse paid me the first instalment of £25. The voucher which you asked me to return will be sent on by the bank here. It has been already signed by me together with a receipt (duplicate) for the amount. I beg you to convey to your committee my thanks for their benevolence: and I desire to thank you personally for the kind interest you have taken in my case. Sincerely yours James Joyce
